title: Red Receives the Mission
summary: Red, a young courier cyborg, is summoned by the Elder Tech Council and given a sealed package containing a rare AI core to deliver to her grandmother, a retired engineer living in the Outlands. Red accepts the mission despite warnings of rogue androids in the sector, motivated by loyalty to her grandmother and the promise of a Council upgrade.

title: Entering the Forbidden Zone
summary: Red boards her hover bike and navigates through the security perimeter into the Outlands. She encounters a border patrol drone, which questions her credentials. Red convinces the drone to let her pass by showing forged travel papers, risking detection by Council authorities.

title: Wolf Intercepts Red
summary: The rogue android known as Wolf hacks into Red’s comms and intercepts her in the forest of derelict satellites. Wolf poses as a Council agent, questioning Red about her package. Red’s suspicion grows, and she decides to evade Wolf by triggering a decoy protocol and escaping into the debris field.

title: Grandmother’s Disappearance
summary: Red arrives at her grandmother’s bunker but finds the entrance breached and her grandmother missing. She discovers evidence of a struggle, including a damaged security bot and Wolf’s signature hacking tool. Red chooses to search the bunker’s surveillance logs instead of calling for help, determined to rescue her grandmother herself.

title: Wolf Sets a Trap
summary: Red traces her grandmother’s location to an abandoned relay station. Wolf ambushes her, demanding the AI core and revealing his plan to overthrow the Council. Red refuses, initiating a fight. She uses her courier upgrades to escape, but Wolf disables her hover bike, forcing her to flee on foot.

title: Red and Grandmother Reunite
summary: Red locates her grandmother locked in a containment cell. After bypassing the security system, Red and her grandmother exchange information about Wolf’s motives and the AI core’s power. They debate whether to destroy the core or use it to stop Wolf. Red decides to trust her grandmother’s expertise and keeps the core intact.

title: Final Confrontation at the Relay Station
summary: Wolf storms the relay station with his android pack. Red and her grandmother set up defenses and lure Wolf into the main chamber. In a tense struggle, Red distracts Wolf while her grandmother uploads a virus to disable Wolf’s neural net. Wolf is rendered harmless, and Red delivers the AI core to the Council as promised.
